name: Golden Roasted Cauliflower with Turmeric | Fit Foodie Finds
instructions: Preheat oven to 425ºF. Spray a cookie sheet or a castiron skillet with coconut oil and set aside.
Add all spices to a small bowl. Mix well and set aside.
Rinse a whole head of cauliflower with water. Dry and generously spray with coconut oil cooking spray.
Next, pour spice mixture over the head of the cauliflower. Use your hands to evenly rub the spices into the cauliflower.
Wrap the cauliflower with tin foil and roast at 425ºF for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and remove tin foil. Place cauliflower back into the oven for 20-30 additional minutes or until golden brown.
Serve with hummus, tahini, or any other tasty dip.
